entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:19 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023
